Msg.Title: New Announcement Feature!
Msg.Body: The announcement balloon appears every time users visit the home page. The megaphone icon (above right) opens and closes the balloon.

Msg.Title: TM Conference Call
Msg.Body: Mark your calendar to attend the monthly TM conference call. The conference calls are held on the fourth Tuesday of each month, from 2-3 p.m. ET

Msg.Title: Welcome to the TMRC!
Msg.Body: The TMRC provides Training Managers with information on duties and responsibilities, job aids, training and other materials.
